sourcesContent:
<template>
  <b-modal v-model="show" @hide="handleClose" title="Add/Edit Subscriber">
    <b-form @submit.prevent="saveSubscriber">
      <b-form-group label="Name" label-for="name">
        <b-form-input id="name" v-model="localSubscriber.name" required></b-form-input>
      </b-form-group>
      <b-form-group label="Registration Number" label-for="registration_number">
        <b-form-input id="registration_number" v-model="localSubscriber.registration_number" required></b-form-input>
      </b-form-group>
      <b-form-group label="Address" label-for="address">
        <b-form-input id="address" v-model="localSubscriber.address"></b-form-input>
      </b-form-group>
      <b-form-group label="City/Town" label-for="city_town">
        <b-form-input id="city_town" v-model="localSubscriber.city_town"></b-form-input>
      </b-form-group>
      <b-form-group label="State" label-for="state">
        <b-form-input id="state" v-model="localSubscriber.state"></b-form-input>
      </b-form-group>
      <b-form-group label="Pincode" label-for="pincode">
        <b-form-input id="pincode" v-model="localSubscriber.pincode"></b-form-input>
      </b-form-group>
      <b-form-group label="Phone" label-for="phone">
        <b-form-input id="phone" v-model="localSubscriber.phone"></b-form-input>
      </b-form-group>
      <b-form-group label="Email" label-for="email">
        <b-form-input type="email" id="email" v-model="localSubscriber.email" required></b-form-input>
      </b-form-group>
      <b-form-group label="Category" label-for="category">
        <b-form-select id="category" v-model="localSubscriber.category" :options="categories" required></b-form-select>
      </b-form-group>
      <b-form-group label="Type" label-for="stype">
        <b-form-select id="stype" v-model="localSubscriber.stype" :options="types" required></b-form-select>
      </b-form-group>
      <b-form-group label="Notes" label-for="notes">
        <b-form-textarea id="notes" v-model="localSubscriber.notes"></b-form-textarea>
      </b-form-group>
      <b-button type="submit" variant="primary">{{ isEdit ? 'Update' : 'Add' }}</b-button>
    </b-form>
  </b-modal>
</template>

<script>
import magazineSubscriberService from '@/services/magazineSubscriberService';

export default {
  props: {
    isEdit: {
      type: Boolean,
      default: false,
    },
    subscriber: {
      type: Object,
      default: () => ({}),
    },
  },
  data() {
    return {
      show: false,
      localSubscriber: { ...this.subscriber },
      categories: [],
      types: [],
    };
  },
  watch: {
    subscriber: {
      immediate: true,
      handler(newSubscriber) {
        this.localSubscriber = { ...newSubscriber };
      },
    },
    show(value) {
      if (!value) {
        this.$emit('close');
      }
    },
  },
  methods: {
    fetchCategories() {
      magazineSubscriberService.getCategories().then((response) => {
        this.categories = response.data.map((category) => ({
          value: category._id,
          text: category.name,
        }));
      });
    },
    fetchTypes() {
      magazineSubscriberService.getTypes().then((response) => {
        this.types = response.data.map((type) => ({
          value: type._id,
          text: type.name,
        }));
      });
    },
    saveSubscriber() {
      const action = this.isEdit
        ? magazineSubscriberService.updateMagazineSubscriber(this.localSubscriber._id, this.localSubscriber)
        : magazineSubscriberService.createMagazineSubscriber(this.localSubscriber);
      action.then(() => {
        this.$emit('save');
        this.show = false;
      });
    },
    handleClose() {
      this.show = false;
      this.$emit('close');
    },
  },
  mounted() {
    this.fetchCategories();
    this.fetchTypes();
  },
};
</script>

<style>
/* Add your styles here */
</style>
